tpk::PointingModel

tpk::PointingModel Class Reference

#include <PointingModel.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Telescope pointing model.

A PointingModel summerizes the pointing model at a given roll and pitch as index errors in the two axes, the non-perpendicularity, a telescope vector and the orientation of the mount.

Attention:
All classes derived from PointingModel must implement the clone method.
